events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case was reviewed and categorized under Refund based on customer's request for a money back due to wrong item received.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund request regarding the incorrect order.
Hello! I'm Emily from support. I'm sorry to hear you got the wrong item. Let me help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo of the item that shows it is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund within 3-5 business days. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
Thanks for handling this quickly! I appreciate the prompt response and look forward to the refund.
The refund process has been completed successfully, and the customer has been informed about the timeline.
Just following up to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything is perfect now. Thanks again for your help!
We are closing this case now as the refund has been successfully processed and customer confirmed satisfaction.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on the support experience.
